Articles.Content:
Yes, all you need to do is get alot of kerbals

Mun: 1.5 Point per kerbal

Minmus: 1 point per kerbal

Duna, Dres, Ike, and Eve: 2 points per kerbal

Water Base on Laythe: 3 points per kerbal

Land Base on Laythe: 5 points per kerbal

 any other moon around jool: 4

Eeloo: 10

Moho: 9

I had a 154 Kerbal supporting 100% base on duna.

Rules:

No cheating

You must record(Sorry for those with crappy computers)

Multi launches are allowed

Speeding up video is 100% supported, don't waste me 24 hours

It must be more than 10 kerbals

Bonus Points:

Good looking base: x3

Mobile: x2

Compact: x2

Return Vessel within 500 meters: x5

Wow Factor: whatever I rate it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

If you have TAC life support x3

Save File download: +25

Score

My score 616(154 kerbals, x2 Duna, x2 Mobile)

1st

2nd

3rd

4th

5th

6th

7th

8th

9th

10th The Doctor(10,000,000)

DEADLINE 9/15/15

PASSED

Rewards:

1st place: Medal of honor/honour

2nd place: Medal of silver

3rd place: Medal of bronze

Higher than me: Medal of epic

Good video editing: You can pat yourself on the back

Optional Awards:

TBD

Wow, nobody??? Never making a challenge again.

Guess you guys aren't good enough
